member_organisations:
AAAS is a membership organization composed of individual members globally (roughly 120,000 individual members at any given time, predominantly based in the US but with individual members from and/or residing globally). 
 
AAAS affiliates include 258 societies and academies of science, serving more than 10 million members, representing the world’s largest federation of scientific and engineering societies. 
 
For information on affiliated organizations, please see: https://www.aaas.org/aaas-affiliates
fields_of_interest: Education and training, Energy, Environment, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, External Relations, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Horizon 2020; ERA; research and development; science policy; policy for science; science, technology and innovation for the UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs); EU global partnerships for science and technology (e.g. EU-US, EU-AU, etc).
organisation_name: American Association for the Advancement of Science (AAAS)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
